name: Digging Astray
description:
There are legends of a dungeon that is never the same for any two adventurers. It is said that only the bravest of souls and quickest of wit are able to uncover its mystery.

Explore the procedurally generated dungeon by spawning units to dig and fight their way through.

How to Play

Select from a range of tools and units to aid you in your adventure:

TNT - A trusty tool for any spelunker. Use the TNT to reveal chunks of the dungeon much quicker than any worker!

The Grunt - A loyal worker proficient with a pickaxe. These units will help you reveal more of the cave, but don't count on them to carry their weight in battle.

The Knight - A hardened fighter, ready to fight and protect the well-being of their fellow units at a moments notice. Although they may not know their way around a pickaxe, they make light work of any threats with their trusty sword.

Spawner - The most crucial tool of an adventurers kit. Allows you to purchase more units at a moments notice. All adventurers brave enough to enter the dungeon are given on free of charge upon entry (how nice)!

Controls:

  • Left click - Select Spawner/Unit
  • Right click - Deselect Spawner
  • WSAD - Move camera
  • M - Toggle map (Sudoku board)
  • R - Reset scene
  • Mouse Wheel - Zoom camera

There are glorious treasures and murderous creatures to be discovered in these caves, so stay alert and good luck!
